// Home.jsx import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Home.css'; export default function Home() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const leadText = `InsightFlow uncovers the stories inside your spreadsheets and turns them into actionable, stakeholder-ready intelligence. Upload CSV or Excel files and let our automated pipelines detect trends, surface anomalies and prepare polished reports. From energy and financial metrics to attendance and custom datasets, get consistent insights quickly—without manual heavy lifting.`; return (
{/* FULL BACKGROUND HERO WITH TEXT ON LEFT */}
Introducing InsightFlow

Turn your data into clarity and momentum

{leadText}

Learn more
{/* Features (unchanged) */}

Secure by design

Role-based access control, SSO-ready, and encrypted storage.

Shareable reports

Export PDF or schedule automated email reports.

AI-driven insights

Auto-detect anomalies and get suggested actions.

); }
